Label: EOPHC
Description: Extra-ordinary public health challenge. Contains every Event that takes place in a health emergency scenario and requires response by qualified agencies/organizations

Label: Human Factor
Description: An EOPHC involving a technological, industrial, chemical etc. event based on human factor

Label: Transportation
Description: An EOPHC involving a technological event in transportation

Label: Air
Description: An EOPHC involving a technological event in air transportation

Label: Air accident
Description: An accident in air transportation involving any kind of aircraft

Label: Land
Description: An accident in air transportation involving any kind of aircraft happening on the land

Label: Sea
Description: An accident in air transportation involving any kind of aircraft happening on the sea

Label: Road
Description: An EOPHC involving a technological event in road transportation

Label: Road accident
Description: An accident in road transportation including any mean of road transport

Label: Aquatic
Description: An EOPHC involving a technological event in transportation based on water

Label: Shipping accident
Description: An accident in sea, river, lake  transportation including ships, boats and other water-based means of transport

Label: Rail
Description: An EOPHC involving a technological event in railway transportation

Label: Rail accident
Description: An accident in railway  transportation including trains and other railway vehicles

Label: Open
Description: An accident in railway transportation involving any kind of aircraft happening on the open space

Label: Tunnel
Description: An accident in railway transportation involving any kind of aircraft happening in a tunnel

Label: Incidents
Description: An EOPHC technological event due to human intervention

Label: Chemical
Description: A chemical event or accident

Label: Radio/nuclear
Description: A radionuclear event or accident

Label: Explosion
Description: An explosion due to human intervention

Label: Fire
Description: A fire due to human intervention

Label: Fire in building
Description: A fire happening in a building (house, hotel, hospital, school etc.)

Label: Fire in industry
Description: A fire happening in industry (factory, warehouse etc)

Label: Collapse
Description: A collapsing event

Label: Building collapse
Description: A collapse of a building

Label: Road collapse
Description: A collapse of a road

Label: Bridge collapse
Description: A collapse of a bridge

Label: Industry
Description: An EOPHC involving a technological event in industry
